$6,000.00
MentorAPM

details.message:
`001.008.002 Mk_Workstages_Equip`
- Test assigns Equipment "Power Converter" to each stage of the work order. 
- Stage A uses 10 Power Converters, Stage B uses 20, and Stage C uses 30. 
- 1 Power Converter cost $100/h. 
- Total estimated equipment cost is found by the following formula: A(100$ * 10h) + B(100$ * 20h) + C(100$ * 30h) = $6000.00.
details.name: COPY_001.008.002 Mk_Workstages_Equip
